text: tatha (yaad karo us samay ko) jab allaah un (shatru) ko ladaee ke samay tumhaaree aankhon mein tumhaare lie thoda karake dikha raha tha aur inakee aankhon mein tumhen thoda karake dikha raha tha, taaki jo hona tha, allaah usaka nirnay kar de aur sabhee karm allaah hee kee or phere[1] jaate hain
